resources.string: This list of alarms will be set

The main phase: The liver cleansing and excretion 4 tablespoons of Epsom salts dissolved in 720 ml of water, to drink in four portions (180 ml per glass). One of the main tasks of Epsom salts is to make the bile ducts wider, allowing the stones to glide through easily. Moreover, it cleans waste products that can hinder the excretion of stones. Drink the first two portions between 6-8 P.M.
  • 9:30 P.M. No bowel movement? Perform an enema
  • 9.45 P.M. Press one grapefruit or alternatively 1 orange and 1 lemon; the juice is placed in a sealable vessel or glass. Add 120 ml of olive oil. Shake this until the solution is watery.
  • 10 P.M. Stand next to your bed (do not sit down!) and drink the solution quickly, ideally at a time, and in no more than 5 minutes. Lie down with elevated upper body (use 1 or 2 pillows), or alternatively, pull to the right side and the knees towards your head. Stay in this position for at least 20 minutes absolutely calm and steer attention to your liver. Go to sleep.
  • 6 A.M. The next day (Day 7), drink the third portion of the dissolved Epsom salts. Gymnastics or yoga is recommended. If you are tired, return to bed.
  • 8 A.M. Last portion of the dissolved Epsom salts.
  • 10 A.M. Drink freshly squeezed fruit juice. Half an hour later you can eat one or two pieces of fresh fruit. An hour later you can eat a light meal.
Swipe up and down to see more hints
The early bird catches the worm
Don’t bite off more than you can chew
You scratch my back, I’ll scratch yours.
The pen is mightier than the sword.
A little knowledge is a dangerous thing.
One drop of poison infects the whole tun of wine.
You cannot teach old dogs new tricks.
